days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O Saint Germaine, look down from Heaven and intercede for the many abused children in our world.
Help them to sanctify these sufferings, and ask God the Father to protect them and end the abuse they are enduring.
Strengthen children who suffer the effects of living in broken families.
Protect those children who have been abandoned by their parents and live in the streets.
Beg God’s grace of repentance and conversion on the parents who abuse their children.
Intercede for handicapped children and their parents.
Saint Germaine, you who suffered neglect and abuse so patiently, pray for our intentions (mention request here…)
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Germaine Cousin, pray for us!
